predictions.text: U.S. CPI (headline, MoM, seasonally adjusted) for November 2025 will print between -0.1% and +0.2%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS CPI-U news release Table 1; the 'All items' percent change from preceding month (SA) must fall within the stated range.
monitoring_signals: Cleveland Fed CPI nowcast for November
predictions.rationale: Disinflation trend persists, with soft goods and energy offsetting sticky shelter.

predictions.text: U.S. Core CPI (MoM, SA) for November 2025 will print between +0.1% and +0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS CPI news release Table 1; the 'All items less food and energy' percent change from preceding month (SA) must be within range.
monitoring_signals: Market rents (ZORI, Apartment List) as shelter lead indicators
Retail discounting (Adobe Digital Price Index) for goods
predictions.rationale: Core services remain sticky but moderating; goods disinflation continues.

predictions.text: University of Michigan Consumer Sentiment Index (final) for December 2025 will print between 73.0 and 80.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in the University of Michigan final December release; the headline Consumer Sentiment Index must be within range.
monitoring_signals: Gasoline price movements before survey close
Equity market performance and media coverage of inflation
predictions.rationale: Final readings typically revise modestly from preliminaries; gas and markets drive sentiment.

predictions.text: At the December 2025 FOMC meeting, the SEP median projection for the 2026 federal funds rate will be between 3.0% and 3.6%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in the Federal Reserve Summary of Economic Projections tables released with the December FOMC; the median appropriate policy rate for 2026 must be within range.
predictions.rationale: Disinflation supports a lower terminal path, but not far below neutral.

predictions.text: OFAC will announce at least one DPRK (North Korea)-related sanctions designation via a U.S. Treasury press release by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation via a U.S. Treasury press release explicitly referencing DPRK/North Korea with new SDN designations.
monitoring_signals: Missile tests or cyber activity linked to DPRK
predictions.rationale: Year-end enforcement cadence and ongoing DPRK activity make a designation likely.

predictions.text: The European Commission will open at least one new formal DSA proceeding against a Very Large Online Platform by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official European Commission communication announcing initiation of DSA proceedings against a VLOP (press release or decision publication).
monitoring_signals: EC pre-notices or requests for information
Reporting by Politico Europe/FT on pending DSA actions
predictions.rationale: Post-first fine momentum and political incentives raise odds of additional actions.

predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will report at least one X1.0 or stronger solar flare by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: SWPC event reports or daily summaries listing an X-class (≥X1.0) flare during the period.
predictions.rationale: Solar Cycle 25 near peak increases frequency of X-class events.

predictions.text: NYMEX WTI crude oil front-month futures will settle at or below $72.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via CME/NYMEX official settlements; any front-month WTI settlement ≤ $72.00 before deadline counts.
monitoring_signals: EIA weekly U.S. crude inventory builds
OPEC+ quota headlines or compliance slippage
predictions.rationale: Inventory builds and macro softness could pressure prices despite geopolitics.

predictions.text: Mozilla will publish at least one security advisory in December 2025 with Critical severity affecting Firefox or Thunderbird.
predictions.verification_criteria: Presence of at least one December 2025 Mozilla Security Advisory labeled 'Critical' for Firefox/Thunderbird on mozilla.org.
monitoring_signals: Firefox/ESR release notes and security advisories
Reported browser RCEs in NVD or Zero Day Initiative
predictions.rationale: Mozilla routinely patches Critical vulnerabilities on regular release cycles.

predictions.text: CISA ICS-CERT will publish at least one ICS Advisory in December 2025 with CVSS v3.x Base Score ≥ 9.8.
predictions.verification_criteria: At least one CISA ICS Advisory (ICSA-*) dated December 2025 listing a vulnerability with CVSS v3.x Base Score ≥ 9.8 on cisa.gov.
monitoring_signals: Vendor ICS advisories (Siemens, Schneider Electric, Rockwell)
NVD entries for ICS CVEs with high scores
predictions.rationale: Critical ICS flaws are disclosed frequently; year-end batches are common.
